title: (x) Kellogg's/Coca Cola style "AdKiivi" logo - custom designed {Riccardo Sartori}
content:
anyone can help me to find what is font of this logo ?

you can watch this logo here : [http://www.adkiivi.fi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011042910/http:/www.adkiivi.fi/ "http://www.adkiivi.fi")

by advance, thank you

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Mainostoimisto Ad Kiivi - Showreel-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011042910/http:/typophile.com/files/Mainostoimisto%20Ad%20Kiivi%20-%20Showreel-1.jpg) | 12.33 KB |
author: poluske

comments.content: Judging by the three different "i"s, I'll say it's not a font, but custom lettering.
